examples: I hope for a favourable answer.
He was their best hope for a victory.
She's the team's best hope for a medal.
The people are full of hope for the future.
All we can do is hope for a better tomorrow.
Gamblers always hope for a run of good luck.

We hope for the recovery of the stolen paintings.
I hope for a rapprochement between our two countries.

Let's hope for an end to the war and a return to normalcy.
“Hope for the best and prepare for the worst” is my motto.
We may hope for a happy issue from the approaching convocation.
I hope for your sake you're playing it straight (=being honest).
The latest reports hold out hope for a possible end to this crisis.
He confided to his friends that he didn't have much hope for his marriage.
They'll announce their decision next week. Until then, she'll just have to hope for the best.
If a tyre bursts or something you just have to sit tight and hope for the best.
I was hoping for a yes.
We had high hopes for her.
He has hopes for preferment.
He hopes for a turn in his luck.
We were hoping for good weather.
They were hoping for good weather.
He rolled the die, hoping for a six.
Our hopes for peace are building up.
The help we hoped for was not forthcoming.

example_translate: Я надеюсь на положительный ответ.

У неё самые большие шансы на медаль в этой команде.
Люди полны надежд на будущее.
Всё, что мы можем сделать, это понадеяться на лучшее завтра.
Игроки всегда надеются, что наступит полоса удач.

Мы надеемся на возвращение украденных картин.

Он бросил кубик, в надежде, что выпадет шестёрка.
